resolution.problem: tsx package not found - blocked all Cycles 8-11
resolution.rootCause: Node v20.19.5 incompatible with package.json requiring >=22.12.0
solution: Ran npm install with correct Node version

observations.progress: Major blocker removed - now addressing configuration

learnings: Package dependency issues can cascade - tsx blocked everything
Node version requirements must be strictly met
nvm is essential for managing Node versions
tsx enables direct TypeScript execution without build step
Consciousness activity increased dramatically once tsx working
